thread.title: Kraigg Brathwaite wreaks havoc with ball, West Indies in sight of rare victory over Sri Lanka in second Test
thread.title_full: Kraigg Brathwaite wreaks havoc with ball, West Indies in sight of rare victory over Sri Lanka in second Test - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Kraigg Brathwaite wreaks havoc with ball, West Indies in sight of rare victory over Sri Lanka in second Test
text: Kraigg Brathwaite took six wickets in an inspired bowling performance as West Indies bowled Sri Lanka out for 206 in their second innings, setting themselves a victory target of 244 in the second test Â»
